title: Designer backsplash, Quartz & granite countertops, Wood-style flooring
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1448 Sq.
Introducing TriVista on Speer, offering luxury studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartments anchored in downtown Denver’s coolest corner: The Golden Triangle Creative District.
Walk to the city’s best artistic, historical, and outdoor attractions.
Take in the breathtaking mountain views.
TriVista truly satisfies your need for beauty, adventure, and escape.

Designer backsplash, Quartz & granite countertops, In-home washer & dryer, Wood-style flooring, Stainless steel appliances, Air conditioning & heating, Two interior design schemes to choose from, Studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom & 3-bedroom units available, Electronic lock system, Electric or gas ranges, 2-level parking garage, Boutique-style interiors, Tandem & private garage boxes, Balconies & private patios

Rooftop deck with mountain, City Hall & downtown views, Luxurious pool & spa with lounge, Outdoor lounge with TVs, Expansive two-story fitness facility, Direct access to the Cherry creek bike path, BBQ/dining areas, Pet spa & grooming station, Yoga/spin studio & on-demand classes, Live/work townhomes available, Demonstration kitchen, Wine cellar, Car charging stations for electric vehicles, Gameroom with pool tables, Conference spaces & individual work stations, Bicycle/ski repair & storage, Dining lounge, Two courtyards with firepits, Ask about furnished options
